Name: Royal Velvet Margarita
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Pineapple shell (frozen) glass .
Review: An almond and berry flavoured Margarita.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Velvet Margarita Cantina, Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Royal Velvet Margarita contains 243 calories
